title: Wiring
fullText:
The patient area shall be inspected to ensure that each socket-outlet located below 2.3 m or if located above and used for medical electrical equipment, is protected by an LPD.
Where RCDs are used as LPDs, this check is carried out by tripping the RCD at each socket-outlet.
Where isolation transformers are used as LPDs, this check shall be carried out by applying a suitable fault to each socket-outlet and observing the response on the associated LIM.
